meeting_info.organization: Grand Park South TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 6.
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the May 2, 2024 Grand Park South TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a request by Vector Studies LLC for an extension of material dates and deadlines.
agenda_items.description: Request for an extension of twelve months for the Legacy of Hope DFW redevelopment project addressed as 2516 Martin Luther King Jr Boulevard.
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the Director of the Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Grand Park South TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.presenter: Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development, Sue Hounsel, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a regular meeting schedule for the Grand Park South TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2025.
